entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] `CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToNonWasmPageComeBackAndHitAgain` gets stuck #87155
  • [API Proposal]: UnicodeJsonEncoder #87153
  • [API Proposal]: Uri : ISpanFormattable #87151
    8.0.0
  • Support Meter and Instrument Tags in MetricsEventSource #87150
    8.0.0
  • Add a SPMI collection for pre-AVX512 hardware #87145
  • Emit a diagnostic when encountering JsonConverAttribute annotations with inaccessible converter type constructors. #87140
    8.0.0
  • Interop generators don't generate calls to custom marshallers for elements of blittable type #87139
  • "Unsafe" in UnsafeRelaxedJsonEscaping is misleading from a security standpoint, in both directions #87138
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Generator does not warn on invalid uses of GeneratedComClassAttribute #87137
  • SQL Impersonation run failed with System.IO.FileLoadExceptions at .NET single file app #87132
  • Test failure readytorun\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\CpuId_R2R_Avx2\\CpuId_R2R_Avx2 #87118
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #87117
  • Test failure JIT/SIMD/VectorAdd_ro/VectorAdd_ro #87116
    8.0.0

Closed

  • System.Text.Json is adding EqualityContract properties metadata for records #77675
    Future
  • JsonSourceGenerationMode.Metadata emits references to internal members from another assembly #66679
    8.0.0
  • NAOT publish build has a 1MB size delta between reflection free and not (+50% total size) #82607
    Future
  • native\myproject.ilc.rsp exited with code -2147483645. #87122
  • System.Text.Json's default enum converter handles key serialization inconsistently #87129
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' when compiling SSE heavy code targeting ARM64 #58861
    8.0.0
  • outerloop-nightly is broken because "native test components" is unavailable #85263
  • AppHost.Bundle.Tests_net8.0_x86 test failed in CI #87102
  • TagList.GetEnumerator() allocates #87022
    Future
  • Unable to connect to SQL Server using Apline 3.17 dotnet image. Encryption(ssl/tls) handshake failed SqlException. #87123
  • Localization cultures (en-AU) not installing under Alpine 3.17 #87128
  • Libraries like HttpClient use legacy activity creation, requiring hacks in OpenTelemetry SDK #86873
  • MacOS - System.Net.Security - No usable version of libssl was found #83650
    Future
  • Using JsonTypeInfo<object> with JsonSerializerContext configured throws error during serialization steps #87073
    8.0.0
  • Adding JsonIgnoreAttribute to `new` property fails with ArgumentException #76268
    Future
  • [JIT] x64 InitValueNumStoreStatics is 261k #85953
    8.0.0
  • Question: Thread safety of X509Certificate2 class #87085
  • Trimmer doesn't warn on reflection access to RUC override method #86008
    8.0.0
  • .Net 6 performance of CreateSpecificCulture significantly slower than .net framework and .net core 3.1 #87110
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix trim analyzer warning for inferred type arguments #87156
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87154
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87152
    area-System.Globalization
  • Fix NativeAOT support for JsonStringEnumConverter. #87149
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add UncodeJsonEncoder (fixes #42847). #87147
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, community-contribution
  • Add marshalling tests and warn if interface is partial #87146
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update area-owners.json to reflect change in area-owners.md #87144
    area-Meta
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation (#68835) #87143
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Handle Vector multiplication for long/ulong as intrinsic on pre-AVX512 hardware #87142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals when widening #87141
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Move DynamicCodeSupport default into aot targets #87135
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix handling of CreateScalarUnsafe for embedded broadcast #87134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [mono][interp] Add new call fast path opcodes #87133
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Ensure the CPUID tests cover a couple hwintrinsic disablement edge cases #87127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Combine two table lookups into one while formatting Guid on Arm64 #87126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [VM] Fix potential undefined behavior #87119
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Documentation for the HotColdMap section #87023
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix IDE0001 / IDE0002 (simplify names) in corelib #87106
    area-Meta
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix a number of accessibility resolution issues in the source generator. #87136
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Do not use ValueTuple in SynchronizationContext #87120
    area-System.Threading
  • [nativeaot][tests] Update bundle zip path for NativeAOT sample app #87049
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Test passing struct on a border of 12bit offset #86914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove unnecessary suppressions in APICompat files #87094
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Set .env variables in corerun prior to CLR init #85220
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Fold obj.GetType to a constant #87101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [VM] Fix potential double free #86207
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid bloom filter checks for IndexOfAnyExcept in ProbabilisticMap #85203
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Ensure JsonSerializerOptions always returns a JsonTypeInfo for `object`. #87093
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • fix(76268): Fix invalid behavior for ignored properties with "new" mo… #84756
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix a few Parse uses to be TryParse #87105
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][non-icu] Revert `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #87007
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Update area-owners.md #87121
    area-Meta
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Upgrading Vector256/512 Shuffle() with VBMI support #87083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix creating cultures with extensions in the name #87114
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Disable failing multithreading debugger tests #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Block calls into managed code after a runtime assert #87043
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Implement `FlipBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js - follow up #87051
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Perf blazor scenarios: Use the correct wasm sdk pack #87075
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add back fixed xunit decimal, IntPtr and UIntPtr commented test cases #87084
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Improve codegen for AVX-512 comparisons and general handling of `TYP_MASK` #87089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Open generic enumerable resolution fix #87017 #87025
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Transform indirect calls to direct ones in the importer #85197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Superpmi collection for real-world benchmarks #87104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Enable EventPipe support in MacOS #86766
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector64<T>/Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add timestamps to XUnitLogChecker output #86737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't enable ILLink analyzers for unsupported TFMs #87071
    area-Meta
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Reenable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #84930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-ios
  • {U}Int128 support for Utf8Formatter/Parser #86357
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle diagnostic port configuration in NativeAOT #87088
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SHAKE128 and SHAKE256 #87099
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix inline decision reporting + noinline propagation #87115
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove usage of GeneratedRegex #86911
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #86934
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update logging with processor pipeline #86995
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • add review comment to sb files #87003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • update QuicConnection.ConnectAsync exceptions #87048
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • The AllocationTick threshold is computed by a Poisson process with a 100 KB mean. #85750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd load and load scalar methods #87052
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tools are not able to work with process which is running under tmux #33044
  • GenAPI generates incorrect class declarations for VB authored classes with extension methods #33042
  • Add support for podman credentials by using Valleysoft.DockerCredsProvider 2.2.0 #33034
  • dotnet tool run <TOOL_NAME> doesn't work on Linux #33030

Closed

  • .Net7 dotnet watch regression: Failed to create MSBuildWorkspace for *.fsproj #28998
  • BinaryFormatter is disabled in WinForms or WPF projects in preview6 #32941

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't run helix tests if the build fails #33045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add GarbageCollectionAdaptationMode msbuild property #33043
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Improve warning message for ILLink runtime pack #33041
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Remove DynamicCodeSupport default from SDK #33040
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add dependencies needed for source-build PVP flow #33039
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Update ValleySoft.DockerCredsProvider to get better support for podman authentication #33038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WIP] Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged
  • PackageValidation compare TargetFrameworkInformation instead of TargetFramework property directly #33036
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Do not fail dotnet watch on workspace errors #33006
    untriaged
  • Do not fail dotnet watch on workspace errors #33005
    untriaged
  • [port to main] Explicitly enable BF for WinForms and WPF in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets #33004
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2194098 #33025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Log success or error only for error suppressions #33031
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.0 to 20.3.1 in /eng/dependabot #33028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.3.0 to 20.3.1 in /eng/dependabot #33027
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Set PlatformName and other properties early enough in outer build #33003
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Startup race condition #33007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable error when using BinaryFormatter in GenerateResource #32981
    untriaged
  • Enable some F# tests #16020
    Area-FSharp
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • New: Add the ability to run concurrent client connections #16048
    Area-Watch
  • Add zsh compdef completion script. #14239
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • For templating#3553. Make search results downloads column optional #33024
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: using aliases for any types #4284
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Permit trailing commas in method signatures and invocations #391
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Collection literal conversions #7244

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Feature 'Fully qualify' is current unavailable due to internal error #68443
  • CodeFixProvider throws InvalidOperationException: 'ISymbolDeclarationService' is required to accomplish the task but is not available from the workspace #68440
  • IDE0039 is not reported for implicitly typed lambda #68439

Closed

  • Staying out-of other currencies to bitcoin #68436
  • Using dynamic on macOS .NET Core 3 results in CS0656 Missing compiler required member #39413

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix inserting new values with source generators #68451
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Add support for 'primary header spans' in sticky-scroll. #68450
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix 'use local function' with implicitly typed lambdas #68448
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add assertions for shape of possibly intercepted call #68447
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Set TypeDeclarationFlags.AnyMemberHasAttributes for a type with parameter list and a method-targeted attribute. #68444
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Only record class can have a copy constructor. #68442
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • `makeNotNullMembersMaybeNull` - skip primary constructor capture fields #68441
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Merged

  • Update Language Feature Status to add IDE buddy #68446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix LSIF indexing handling of duplicate analyzer references #68423
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid spinning attempting to create a folder #68394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Rename interceptors feature flag #68430
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Change insertion target for release/dev17.7 #68445
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement definite assignment and region analysis for inline array types #68339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Switch to new lower-overhead spell checking protocol #68426
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix indentation behavior of convert to block-body namespace #68428
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include file-local name prefix in names of explicit interface implementations #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Inline Hints - Don't allow double click and insert params arguments #68434
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allocate less in GetTypeByMetadataName #68415
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Implement IOperation support for inline array access #68373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor NavLink component is active on wrong path #48627
  • Surface option in the Blazor Web App template for server interactivity #48626
  • More detailed metrics around the ExceptionHandler middleware #48625
  • Improve SignalR Backplane for small number of servers #48624
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #48622
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, single_query #48621
  • DirectoryNotFoundException when setting a custom WebRoot at runtime #48620
  • Consider changing diagnostic events to use public declared types as their payload #48616
  • When using signalr in React.js, it does not enter the onclose method and does not working stable #48614
  • EditForm: change API to allow form subission from code #48613

Closed

  • ObjectDisposedException thrown on server shutdown due to disposed MemoryCache #46779
    Discussions
  • Exceptions should be the recommended way of causing HTTP error codes #47020
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #48607
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #48612
  • Perf regression: json #48579
  • gRPC Transcoding KnownTypes.FieldMask as query parameter #45753
  • Blazor WASM - Scoped Services do not behave like a singleton when used with IHttpClientFactory and DelegatingHandler #47318
    Discussions
  • Issue with running hosted Blazer WebAssembly app caused by props file contents #47135
    Discussions
  • Allow rendering components to specific DOM node outside DOM hierarchy like React.createPortal #47178
    Discussions
  • Component inheritance seems to be broken #48447

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle methods that never return in Api Analyzers #48623
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.6.23305.3 #48619
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove Blazor Server template #48615
    area-mvc
  • RDF test migration for some response test cases. #48611
    area-runtime
  • Use FirstPipeInstance setting in named pipes transport #48609
    area-runtime

Updated

  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • Expose SNI hostname in ITlsHandshakeFeature #48572
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • add review comment to sb files #48566
    area-infrastructure
  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm primitive collections #48559
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `797b0ad` to `04cf298` #48561
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `042dd9c` to `1d1834b` #48562
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `797b0ad` to `04cf298` #48563
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d5cae28` to `68cd408` #48564
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm dictionary support #48565
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm complex type support. #48567
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] SupplyFromFormParameter support nested complex object bindings #48570
    area-blazor
  • Unify JSON handling across RDF and RDG #48573
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Send CloseMessage from client to server #48577
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm benchmarks #48582
    area-mvc
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4580469` to `06f44bc` #48584
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `45228c8` to `d60cf22` #48585
    area-infrastructure
  • Add refresh token support to BearerTokenHandler #48595
    area-identity
  • Fix F# MVC template #48600
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Failed to profile .NET iOS app (`dotnet trace`: Unable to read beyond the end of the stream) #3828

Updated

  • `dotnet-trace collect` hangs without completing collection on Linux #3935
  • finalizequeue can exit with exit code 139 #3917
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to release/stable #3952

Merged

  • Revert "Merge main into release/stable" #3951
  • Merge main into release/stable #3950

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator with System.Net.WebRequest #15456
  • Converters/DataTrigger/MultiTrigger not updating the destination property #15455
  • Compatibility elements don't work as expected #15454
  • Get geolocation using maui web view #15451
  • Different behaviours of Shell Flyout on macOS vs WinUI #15446
    Backlog
  • SwipeItem.IsEnable clobbering source value when BindingContext changed #15444
    Backlog
  • [Windows][CarouselView] Position property not working properly #15443

Closed

  • In the maui blazorWebView development, in order to display images provided by external websites, Content-Security-Policy is used, and data: http: https: has been specified, as follows: #15299
  • Windows Labels inside frames not wrapping #13552
    Backlog
  • Recycling Data Template IDs Collide With Existing ItemViewTypes #15437
  • ColumnSpacing docs incorrect #15115

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
  • Don't double-inset Border strokes #15458
  • [net7.0] Corelib Fixes #15457
  • Android: recreate activity on dark mode change #15449
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15447
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Merged

  • [net7.0] Make sure that we have valid values for setting the ContentSize of the ScrollView on iOS #15424
    area/layout 🔲
  • [uitests] Fix appium versions #15453
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Set menuItem show action back to Never #15416
  • Pin main branch to net7 #15452
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.6.0 to 17.6.1 #15408
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Modify ID Generator Starting Point of DataTemplate Class to Prevent ItemViewType Collision #15438
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.11 to 120.0.0.12 #15406
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Correct docs for Grid ColumnSpacing/RowSpacing #15425

Updated

  • First pass at adding developer layout docs #15426
    area/layout 🔲
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fix CollectionView.RemainingItemsThresholdReached #15417
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
    area/layout 🔲
  • Android ecosytem updates #15399
  • Remove netstandard2.1 #15355
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Duplicate entries in join table when updating entity with many-to-many property/ies #31033
  • EF primitive collection - nested string comparison operations #31030

Closed

  • Better management of negated expressions #31027

PullRequests

Created

  • Use raw literal strings goodness #31031

Merged

  • Better management of negated expressions #31028
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.33.0 to 3.34.0 #30988
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Support customized reading and writing of JSON values #31021
  • Generate OPENJSON with WITH unless ordering is required #30983
